title.narrative: Liuzhou Environment Management Project Phase II

description.narrative: To establish sustainable wastewater collection and treatment services within the urban area boundaries of Liuzhou City and in four county towns located upstream of Liuzhou City.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Annex A Section II para 6. (a). | Description :LMWTC shall undertake to produce for each of itsfiscal years, total revenues equivalent to not less than the sum of its total operating expenses; and debt service reqs. exceeddepreciation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Annex A Section II para 6. (b). | Description :LMWTC shall undertake, before October 31 of each ofits fiscal years, review with Guangxi and Liuzhouas to whether LMWTC would meet the requirements of such year and the followingfiscal year. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section C. para 1. | Description :Guangxi in carrying out the Project shall implement, and shallcause each Project Counties/ District and LMWTC to implement the applicable EMP in a manner satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section C. para 2 a. | Description :Maintain policies and procedures adequate to enable them tomonitor and evaluate, in accordance with guidelines acceptable to the Bank, the implementation of the EMPs. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section C. para 2 b. | Description :Prepare, under terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank, andfurnish to the Bank by March 15 and September 15 of each year, commencing on September 15, 2011. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section C. para 3. | Description :Guangxi shall provide, and shall cause the Project Counties/Districts concerned and LMWTC to provide, to the Bank for its prior concurrence any proposed modification or waiver of any EMP orRAP. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section D para (a). | Description :Guangxi shall make available the principal amount to Liuzhou inDollars of the value of the currency or currencies so withdrawn on account of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section D para (b). | Description :Guangxi shall recover: (i) the Front-end Fee, interest duringconstruction and any caps and collars; and (ii) the principal amount over a period of 30 years, inclusive of a grace period of 5.5yr | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section D para (c). | Description :Guangxi shall charge interest on such principal amount, withdrawnand outstanding from time to time at a rate equal to the rate of interest applicable from time to time. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section F para 1. (a) i and ii. | Description :Counties' obligation: (i) to collect wastewatertariffs and transfer such collections to LMWTC; (ii) to provide subsidies to LMWTC as needed to cover operating costs and debtservice payments. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section F para 1. (b) i and iii. | Description :LMWTC obligated to operate WWTPs and the trunk sewerconnecting pumping stations to the plant and meet all the debt service obligations if the Project counties fail to perform them. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section G para 1. | Description :Guangxi shall cause LMWTC to not later than six months after Aug23, 2011, enter into an agreement with Liuzhou Yufeng Cement Plant, which shall include such obligations. | Due Date :24-Feb-2012
